channel.title: travel restrictions on Detective Beaver tells stories
channel.description: Recent content in travel restrictions on Detective Beaver tells stories

item.title: 5 months after AOR
item.description: Posting the first post is like reading the first page of a new book. It’s exciting. It’s been almost 5 months since we submitted our PR application and got AOR. Time flies and it’s definitely giving us a hard time to overcome all the mental challenges of being apart. A family should be together. Meanwhile, the Canadian Government has been trying to formalize all the formalities to implement a new set of border restrictions due to the COVID pandemic.
